name: TRAIN GAEM
description:
Keep it alive.

Keep the train alive by shoveling coal to the firebox.

Keep the train company alive by collecting ticket fees and selling beverages from travellers.

This game is a team effort for Ludum Dare 46, where

  • Kalle Kivisto created theme music and programmed a little
  • kovalok programmed a lot
  • tuho created graphics a lot
  • Ed-Die created SFX a lot
  • seamule programmed a little and created graphics a little

Made with Unity.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/train-gaem

https://github.com/obscurage/ld46yeah
